title: Solar Fields - Until We Meet the Sky
description:
01. From The Next End (9:17)
02. Broken Radio Echo (3:56)
03. Singing Machine (6:55)
04. After Midnight, They Speak (3:40)
05. When The Worlds Collide (6:33)
06. Dialogue With A River (10:07)
07. Forgotten (3:15)
08. Night Traffic City (9:54)
09. Sombrero (5:44)
10. Last Step In Vacuum (9:13)
11. Until We Meet The Sky (5:02)
12. Epilogue (5:17)

A stunning masterpiece from Swedish composer Magnus Birgersson who once again takes us by surprise and delivers a wide, lush and electric 10th album. Until we meet the sky has a an intensely cinematic sound; from introspective, wispy and intimate ambient electronica it slowly builds up to a shoegazing spirit engulfing the listener in an ethereal dreamworld. An album of dizzying beauty composed by Solar Fields as a one track story in twelve phases from nightscapes to the sky. Deep and addictive.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½
